entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gods Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
